'''Ding Ding Ding, We Have A Winner! Again!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must get three treasure chests and pass [[Old Chou]]'s treasure hunt game.

==Notes==
* The number of games is limited per server reset (5 or 7). Chests are placed randomly, but more often in downtown. The player either can find all chests in one run or none.
